item.title: Pregnant woman murdered by father-in-law in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[1
2
Photos: Rekha, SiddappaRaichur: A five-month pregnant woman was allegedly murdered by her father-in-law following a family dispute at Chikkahanagi village of Sirwar taluk on Jan 28.Police said the accused, Siddappa, 50, allegedly attacked his daughter-in-law Rekha, 23, with a knife, stabbing her in the neck and face before fleeing. Severely injured, Rekha managed to rushed out of the house seeking help, but collapsed and died, locals said.Rekha had married Nagaraj three years ago. Whil...]]>
item.author: Tnn
